epd_metadata.declaration_owner: Holcim México Operaciones S.A. de C.V.

product_description.product_scope: 26 concrete mixes manufactured at the Holcim Mexico Operaciones S.A. de C.V. Tijuana Il concrete facility

lca_information.study_goal: To comply with the procedures for creating a Type III environmental product declaration (EPD) and publish the EPD for public review.
lca_information.cut_off_criteria: Minimum of 95% of the total inflows (mass and energy) to the upstream and core modules
lca_information.data_sources: ecoinvent V3.8 database and a local EPD database

data_quality_assessment.consistency: Same modeling structure across product systems

transport_and_installation.product_transport_requirements: Diesel fuel used by the mixing trucks is direct primary information reported from Holcim México records for the year 2022.

end_of_life.included_stages: Not included in this LCA. Excluded stages include transportation of the manufactured material to the construction site; on-site construction processes and components; building use and maintenance; and end-of-life effects.

recycled_materials_handling.recycled_reused_material_components: The amount of returned concrete is based on Holcim primary data for the reference year, 2022.

additional_info.regulated_substances: No regulated substances of very high concern are utilized on site.
